updates.title: Figma's acquisition of AI-powered media generation company Weavy signals major expansion into AI-generated content creation, with plans to integrate the technology across the Figma platform under the 'Weave' brand in coming months.

Apple CEO Tim Cook confirms the company is actively exploring M&A opportunities in the AI space, following their OpenAI partnership, suggesting major AI acquisition announcements may be coming in the near future.

Rising consumer concerns about AI data centers driving up electricity costs could trigger industry backlash, with potential regulatory and public relations challenges ahead for major AI companies expanding infrastructure.

Nvidia's reported $1B investment in coding AI startup Poolside and expanded partnerships with Korean tech giants Hyundai, Samsung, SK, and Naver indicate accelerating enterprise AI adoption across manufacturing and consumer electronics sectors.

AI bubble concerns intensify as CoreWeave's failed $1.1B acquisition of Core Scientific highlights overvaluation risks, while the company pivots to smaller acquisitions like Python notebook startup Marimo, suggesting a potential market correction ahead.
